page.title: 10AN ADULT'S DAY ALSAGER
page.content: {07.15}Awakened by a telephone call from a standby engineer. {07.30}Arise, wash, dress, breakfast {08.00}Leave for work. Fine and sunny. {08.30}Arrive at work. Contact head office. Depart for Northwich. {09.45}Arrive Northwich.New machine off-loaded. Conduct site meeting with customer staff for product check. {11.30}Depart for Congleton. Stop en route for surprise lunch at home. {13.00}Arrive Congleton.Set up schedule for Northwich machine installation. Depart for Bradford.Performance review {14.30}Arrive Bradford. Constructive meeting. Satisfied customer. {17.30}Arrive Congleton.Check overnight standby arrangements.Next stop home. {17.45}Arrive home.Meal.Go to hospital. {19.00}Mother doing well.Stop at inn. {21.00}Home.Discuss activities. {22.30}Call from Worcester.Problem.Bed.
